description.value: ValueSet IMMZD2DTCholeraWCVaccines for IMMZ.D2.DT.Cholera.WC vaccines. Business rule: Determine if the client is due for a cholera vaccination according to the national immunization schedule Trigger: IMMZ.D2 Determine required vaccination(s) if any Table: Whole-cell (WC) vaccines schedule
